Plus, who can resist the charm of Scotty Smalls (Tom Guiry) and his trusty sidekick, Ham Porter (Patrick Renna)?

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more fast-paced and action-packed, "The Rookie" is an exciting cop thriller featuring Dennis Quaid as a seasoned detective trying to solve a tough case with his new rookie partner.
